name: Easy Emotes
summary: Easily display TTV, FFZ, BTTV, and 7TV Emotes in an Image Source! Animated supported!
versionSummaryHeader: performance increase, 7tv emote compatibility fixed, + new verbose mode!
versionSummaryBody: reworked some background functions so file downloader is no longer needed! 7tv emotes work again, and a new verbose mode is introduced, allowing you to return additional information on each emote if you wish!
